API.title: Movie API
API.description: A service that provides a curated list of the top 50 highest-grossing movies of all time. Our API offers detailed information about each movie, including title, release year, director, and box office revenue. Whether you're a film enthusiast, a developer looking for data to populate your app, or simply curious about the highest-grossing movies in history, our API has everything you need. Explore the world of cinema with our Movie API!
